caption.p: Morphology of A. triangularis cysts after treatment with A. muricata (A–C) and C. trifoliatum (D–F) extract observed by SEM. The cells were treated with the extracts at 4 × MIC. Chlorhexidine (G–I) and 1% DMSO (J–L) were used as positive and negative control, respectively. Magnifications were revealed as: A, D, G, J = 5,000X; B, E, H, K = 10,000X; C, F, I, L = 30,000X.
